title: German Silver Support looking for serious Team
body:
Hey guys im a smurf silver support and im trying to get into a team with this account after quitting my account due to position swap experience but there was like the feeling of being needed as a support more then trying out as another laner or role. 

Im 20 y/o
Got TS and Discord
of course a microphone
im playing league since season 2
my Championpool is quite big just give me one practice game with a Support Champ and ill be making plays.

My Goal is to get into a serious Team and try to get my experience into the Team and Rank up or playing Tournaments.

A Clan in the background would be great to have but feel free to add me ingame if you want to :)

In Game Name: SHC DamnatioN

Cya on the Fields of Justice
